name: Life is currency
description:
Initial post on Ludum Dare page

Pitch

You wake up in somewhere strange.  
A voice ask you to join her in front of tv.  
You have to retrieive 3 cups and put them in a treasure box.  
Your blood is useful.  
Time is ticking.  

Interactions

Move: zqsd wasd
Interact: E
Look: mouse

Tools
  • Unreal Engine 4.22
  • Blender
  • Audacity
  • BlueprintUE for sharing blueprints across computers
Infos

We have a little lag at the start but after it's okay
